OOC: 

While I am not in control of the base and I know there is alot of stuff
going on at once, but I thought I would point out a few details :)

In an ealier post (#68514) the base computer already had heavy doors
slam down and "close the corridors in attemp to keep the
intruder out." I would imagine those same doors would make it difficult
to run through the base. 

Also Azureblade has been giving the computers much in the way of
trouble, I am not sure if they would respond to anyone right now, never
mind an intruder . . . but then again perhaps his mayhem would make it
easier. That's why I asked Airly if Myrmidon's command to put up the
shield was successful. 

In either case, I just wanted to bring out these points to keep us all
on the same sheet of music. 

Preston


--- Robert Riley <chiyohakuryuu@...> wrote:

> Malice:
> Malice dropped down to one knee to avoid the armor piercing rounds
> and roll past Myrmidon.� He drew his chainsword and launched the tip
> at a control panel to drop a blast partition between them.� After he
> got to his feet he locked the partition in place and ran down the
> corridor to drop more partitions from a terminal.� He then overloaded
> the terminal's buffer with jibberish and then moved deeper into the
> base to continue backing up the computer systems.� He finally hacked
> the security system and shut down the autoguns and began looking for
> the captive Maximals.
> 
> 
> ----- Original Message ----
> From: Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...>
> To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
> Sent: Saturday, May 3, 2008 6:36:23 PM
> Subject: Re: Black Fortress
> 
> 
> 
> --- Robert Riley <chiyohakuryuu@ yahoo.com> wrote:
> 
> > Malice:
> > The blow to the face was nothing to him as the soft tissue was
> quick
> > to repair.� His free hand was fast to clamp onto Myrmidon's wrist
> and
> > wrench it at what he hoped was a painful and damaging injury.� his
> > other hand reached back and drew his katanna and spun it around and
> > plunged it down toward Myrmidon.� He released his tail from the
> > cieling to drop down and evade the fire for a moment, but he was
> sure
> > now there would be lasting damage.
> 
> Myrmidon grunted as his arm was bent at an unaccustomed degree, as
> his
> servos protested. Slight sparks flew as his arm bent and fles and
> then
> resisted! It locked into place as he spun in place. 
> 
> A slow smile appeared on Myrmidon's face as Malice attempted to drive
> home the katana. At first it seemed as if it would be a death-lock
> shot, but at the last nano Myrmidon caught the blade on his forearm,
> the blade skitting and flashing on his armor as it cuts deep . . .
> and
> is deflected. 
> 
> But at the same time Myrmidon's shoulder mounted cannons reoriented
> themselves on Malice as the reconfigured thier ordinance. They click
> as
> they slide into place and blast with twin armor piercing rounds!
> 
> Myrmidon's smile broadens!
> 
> Preston
> (Myrmidon)
